text:
@PressSec @realDonaldTrump US #1 in COVID-19 cases. 
2,800,000! Five times the population of Wyoming!

US #1 in COVID-19 deaths. 
130,000! Equivalent to 23% of Wyoming’s entire population. Dead.

Trump - “I take no responsibility at all.”
